title: Large Language Models: How They Work and What They Do
excerpt: A friendly, nontechnical guide to large language models (LLMs). Learn how they work, what they’re good at, common uses (chat, writing, coding, search), and how to choose one — explained for beginners.
author: Autonomous Agentic

title: Creating your first AI Agent in Copilot Studio
excerpt: This is a simple, non-production agent built to demonstrate the initial steps of creating a copilot in Copilot Studio. It answers basic general questions and is used for testing and training only.
author: Autonomous Agentic

title: Personalise Your AI: Changing the Start Message in Copilot Studio
excerpt: Learn how to change your Copilot Studio agent's start message to unlock greater customisation. First impressions matter, so why should it be any different for your agent?
author: Autonomous Agentic
